mapper.select: SELECT ra_name, ST_DISTANCE_SPHERE(POINT(#{param1}, #{param2}), POINT(lng, lat)) AS distance FROM ccu.restarea_Info ORDER BY distance ASC LIMIT 2;
mapper.insert: insert into user_info(id, pw, email, phone, sms_receiver,joindate,user_type,name) values(#{id},#{pw},#{email},#{phone}, null, sysdate(),1,#{name})
mapper.select: select * from user_info where id = #{id} and pw=#{pw}
select max(rec_seq) as max_rec_seq FROM ccu.record_info where id = #{param1}
select event_at,event_content from ccu.event_info where rec_seq=#{rec_seq};
select ei.event_img from ccu.event_info ei inner join ccu.record_info ri ON ei.rec_seq = ri.rec_seq inner join ccu.user_info ui ON ri.id = ui.id where ui.id = #{param1};
select id from ccu.user_info where id = #{id}
select * from user_info where id = #{id} and name = #{name} and email = #{email}
mapper.update: update user_info set pw = #{pw} where id = #{id}
update user_info set name = #{name}, phone = #{phone} where id = #{id}
update user_info set sms_receiver = #{sms_receiver} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select sum(case when dayofweek(event_info.event_at) = 1 then 1 else 0 end) as '1', sum(case when dayofweek(event_info.event_at) = 2 then 1 else 0 end) as '2', sum(case when dayofweek(event_info.event_at) = 3 then 1 else 0 end) as '3', sum(case when dayofweek(event_info.event_at) = 4 then 1 else 0 end) as '4', sum(case when dayofweek(event_info.event_at) = 5 then 1 else 0 end) as '5', sum(case when dayofweek(event_info.event_at) = 6 then 1 else 0 end) as '6', sum(case when dayofweek(event_info.event_at) = 7 then 1 else 0 end) as '7' from ccu.user_info inner join ccu.record_info ON user_info.id = record_info.id inner join ccu.event_info ON record_info.rec_seq = event_info.rec_seq where month(event_info.event_at) = #{param1} and week(event_info.event_at, 1) - week(date_format(event_info.event_at, '%Y-%m-01'), 1) + 1 = #{param2} and user_info.id = #{param3};
